summary:
This is a Simple Retexture of Mehrunes Razor to make it look more fitting for a God.
There\'s nothing over the top, just made the Metal into Gold, made some parts black and detailed the Scabbard and Handle of the blade, the default blade just looked far too dull for being a gift from a Daedra
descriptionHtml:
Name: Mehrunes Razor Retexture
Version: 1.0
Date: 11/28/2011
Category: Models and Textures
Author(s): HadToRegister/TR
Source: http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1895

Description
===========
This is a Simple Retexture of Mehrunes Razor to make it look more fitting for a God.
There\'s nothing over the top, just made the Metal into Gold, made some parts black and detailed the Scabbard and Handle of the blade,
the default blade just looked far too dull for being a gift from a Daedra

Details
=======
This is a Simple Retexture of the Nehrunes Razor to make it looking more fitting for a God.

Install
=======
1. Extract the file to the Data folder.

Uninstall
=========
1. Delete the files in the textures\\armor\\nightingale\\f folder

data\\textures\\weapons\\mehrunesrazor\\mehrunesrazor.dds
data\\textures\\weapons\\mehrunesrazor\\mehrunesrazor_m.dds
data\\textures\\weapons\\mehrunesrazor\\mehrunesrazor_n.dds

Incompatibility
===============
This mod is incompatible with any other mod that changes the texture of Mehrunes Razor.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None.
If the texture isn\'t working for you, you\'ve extracted it to the wrong place.

History
=======
1.0, 10/28/2011 - Initial release.

Contact
=======
HadToRegister at the nexus

Credits
=======
Thanks to Carl Sagan for bringing the Universe to all of us.
Thanks to Neil deGrasse Tyson for continuing Carl Sagan\'s work.
Thanks to George Carlin for making me laugh.
Thanks to Frank Zappa for writing good music.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Photoshop - http://www.adobe.com/products/photoshop/
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
No permissions will be granted, too much of my older stuff ended up in mods I didn\'t give permission for.
author: HadToRegister TR
